nodes.text: Guavian Death Space, also known as Guavian space, was a region of space in the galaxy controlled by the Guavian Death Gang. An asteroid field was located on one edge of the region. During the First Order/Resistance War, the Colossus refueling station passed through Guavian space, and fought a skirmish with Guavian forces inside the asteroid field, which they had traveled through in an attempt to remain unnoticed.
